landingPageFAQ.otherApps.question.message: ko: There are other similar extensions. How is Redirect Web different?

landingPageFAQ.otherApps.answer.message: ko: Redirect Web offers unique features like detailed rule settings, useful rule library, iCloud Sync, Safari support, and more. But each tool has its own advantages. Check our comparison page to help you choose the one that best fits your needs:

landingPageFAQ.otherApps.comparisonLink.description: FAQ answer link to comparison page

landingPageFAQ.appRequired.question.message: ko: Should I get the native app after installing the browser extension?

landingPageFAQ.appRequired.answer.message: ko: Yes. You need to download the Redirect Web app from the App Store regardless of which browser you use. The app is required to manage your rules.

landingPageFAQ.library.question.message: ko: Will the library become paid in the future?

landingPageFAQ.library.answer.message: ko: No, it's always free and open source. You can find the source of all the contents on GitHub.

landingPageFAQ.library.completeListOfLib.message: ko: Complete list of Library Rules

landingPageFAQ.platforms.question.message: ko: Does it work on Windows, Android, or Linux?

landingPageFAQ.platforms.answer.message: ko: Not at this time. Currently, Redirect Web only works on Mac, iPhone, iPad, and Apple Vision Pro.

landingPageFAQ.whichPlanIsBest.question.message: ko: One-time purchase or annual subscription: which is best?

landingPageFAQ.ads.question.message: ko: Does it inject ads or tracking into websites?
landingPageFAQ.ads.question.description: FAQ question about ads and tracking

landingPageFAQ.ads.answer.message: ko: No, it never injects anything like that. No ads, no tracking, no unrelated content.
landingPageFAQ.ads.answer.description: FAQ answer about ads and tracking

landingPageFAQ.ownership.question.message: ko: Could Redirect Web ever be sold to someone else?

landingPageFAQ.ownership.answer.message: ko: 100% no. Browser extensions have deep control over your browsing and data. Redirect Web will always remain in our hands, so you can browse with complete confidence.

landingPageFAQ.whichPlanIsBest.answer.message: ko: We recommend the one-time purchase, as the price difference is small. The main reason we offer the subscription is to allow you to try all the features through its free trial.
